channel.title: Snow, it appeared randomly
channel.description:
Hi guys, after I got rid of SYIPKPKER from my server, I logged on to find there was snow everywhere. How can I get rid of it. I don't think the two things are connected, but I still want to get rid of the snow. It looks gayified.
Many Thanks
Syrillia

item.title: Snow, it appeared randomly
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Thanks, I don’t really want to do that, because it may leave bugs. Plus, if I release the source, I want future user to be able to use it. But it’s fixed now anyway.

Syrillia

Read full topic

item.title: Snow, it appeared randomly
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I had the exact same problem, I just searched through client.java for all the “Weather = 3” and deleted them along with all the weather voids.

Read full topic
